This family is currently in Clementi, they are staying in a HDB rental.
Client is currently 6 months pregnant and they have 2 other young children - aged 4 and 1 years old. She used to work part-time but have stopped since her current pregnancy. Her husband is the only breadwinner and apart from the family's daily expenses, he is currently paying off his loan which will last till next year which then family will be clear of loans and can go back to normal.
With client's current pregnancy, she feels additional stress on the financial matters and due to our worry of her going into pre-natal depression, I am hoping to seek for donors who are able to provide the above.
They do not qualify for SSO because their PCI just above the requirement and SSO will not help out with loans. She has applied 3 times and we have also send out greenlane referral and appeal but SSO is not budging. Thus, hoping that with the basic assistance of the above as requested, it will help them to focus on their loans repayment and they do not need to worry about the basic needs for the child for the next 2 months
